an8.50:1.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo idhalokavijayāya paṭipanno hoti, ayaṃsa loko āraddho hoti.
an8.50:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo susaṃvihitakammanto hoti, saṅgahitaparijano, bhattu manāpaṃ carati, sambhataṃ anurakkhati.
an8.50:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo ye te bhattu abbhantarā kammantā …pe…
an8.50:2.3: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo susaṃvihitakammanto hoti.
an8.50:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo yo so bhattu abbhantaro antojano …pe…
an8.50:3.3: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo saṅgahitaparijano hoti.
an8.50:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, mātugāmo bhattu manāpaṃ carati?
an8.50:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo yaṃ bhattu amanāpasaṅkhātaṃ taṃ jīvitahetupi na ajjhācarati.
an8.50:4.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo bhattu manāpaṃ carati.
an8.50:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo yaṃ bhattā āharati …pe…
an8.50:5.3: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo sambhataṃ anurakkhati.
an8.50:5.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo idhalokavijayāya paṭipanno hoti, ayaṃsa loko āraddho hoti.
an8.50:6.1: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo paralokavijayāya paṭipanno hoti, paraloko āraddho hoti.
an8.50:6.3: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo saddhāsampanno hoti, sīlasampanno hoti, cāgasampanno hoti, paññāsampanno hoti.
an8.50:7.3: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo saddhāsampanno hoti.
an8.50:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti …pe…
an8.50:8.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo sīlasampanno hoti.
an8.50:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati …pe…
an8.50:9.3: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo cāgasampanno hoti.
an8.50:10.3: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo paññāsampanno hoti.
an8.50:10.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo paralokavijayāya paṭipanno hoti, paraloko āraddho hotīti.
